quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), ___________ in association with two DRDO labs has developed India’s first quadruped robot and wearable exo-skeleton.
options: Grene Robotics
Svaya Robotics
Seven Robotics
Carbon Robotics
Invento Robotics

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, Indian Railways has achieved another milestone by operating the first electric train in ___________. The train will run from Mendipathar to Dudhnai.
options: West Bengal
Sikkim
Meghalaya
Assam
Odisha

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), “Learning Science via Standards” initiative has been launched by which of the following organizations to improve students’ learning outcomes in science and promote an interest in science education?
options: CBSE
World Bank
Quality Council of India
Bureau of Indian Standards
Confederation of Indian Industry

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Jharniyojan Portal has been launched by which of the following state/UT governments for the employers to share businesses and manpower-related information and for the candidates looking for jobs?
options: Government of Rajasthan
Government of Jammu & Kashmir
Government of Delhi
Government of Bihar
Government of Jharkhand

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, international conference of Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) on “Shared Buddhist Heritage” has been organized in Delhi by which of the following organizations?
options: Ministry of External Affairs
International Buddhist Confederation (IBC)
Ministry of Culture
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB), India has signed a Memorandum of Cooperation (MoC) to strengthen research cooperation with which of the following countries?
options: Sweden
Denmark
Singapore
Japan
Australia

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), India Posts has signed an MoU with which of the following companies to help MSMEs and to enhance its last-mile delivery services for various e-commerce products?
options: Shiprocket
Gati Ltd.
Delhivery
1 and 2

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, Ministry of AYUSH & Ministry of Rural Development have signed an MoU to collaborate in developing skilled personnel by imparting training for the Ayush healthcare system. The proposed training will be imparted under which of the following schemes?
options: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana 4.0
Pradhan Mantri ‘YUVA’ Yojana
Craftsmen Training Scheme (CTS)
Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), ________ has launched ‘Startup Ecosystem Banking’ for Indian startups and will offer services such as treasury and transaction banking solutions, lending solutions, digital integrations, handling FDI and regulatory compliances, personal banking services for employees and founders.
options: ICICI Bank
HDFC Bank
State Bank of India
HSBC Bank
JPMorgan Chase & Co

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, ___________ in association with National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) has launched Unified Payment Interface (UPI) services without the need to link a Bank Account.

Phonepe

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Reserve Bank of India (RBI) governor, Shaktikanta Das, has been named Governor of the Year by the Central Banking Awards 2023. This is the 2nd time an RBI governor has received the award, ___________ being the first one to receive the award.

Y. Venugopal Reddy
Bimal Jalan
Urjit Patel
Raghuram Rajan
